question.text: Your vehicle is fitted with anti-lock brakes. To stop quickly in an emergency you should

explanation.text: Once you have applied the brake keep your foot firmly on the pedal. Releasing the brake and reapplying it will disable the anti-lock brake system.

answer.text: brake firmly and pump the brake pedal on and off
